__e: Good God! Don't you see that the world has changed?
Well, you see that it isn't a sad story,... but it was about to be.
Don't you see that it's because of you, because of both of you, that I am who I am?
Do you see that man over there, the one who can't take his eyes off me?
Otherwise, if you don't see me by 5:00 a.m. sharp, that means we're on.
You only see him at lunch, but I know him better.
So eager to get on with your charmed lives that you miss what's happening now.
For some reason, that was not foreseen.
Do not see what is happening within me.
